channel.title: Office complex wrong weapon located in cache
channel.description: in office complex rescuing the guard from the zombie is supposed to open a cache with exrta shotgun ammo and several grenades however it gives you the revolver which your supposed to get much later on. additionally the shotgun is supposed to be right outside the guards cage an is apparently missing

item.title: Office complex wrong weapon located in cache
item.dc:creator: SergeantPancakes
item.description:
mikeloeven:

in office complex rescuing the guard from the zombie is supposed to open a cache with exrta shotgun ammo and several grenades however it gives you the revolver which your supposed to get much later on. additionally the shotgun is supposed to be right outside the guards cage an is apparently missing

The BM devs purposely changed the order of when you get what weapon in BM when compared to HL.

Read full topic
item.source: Office complex wrong weapon located in cache
